title: ANGRY
body: I am very upset that every time I want to play a game, any type of game, I am FORCED to wait 20 minutes. I am in low priority queue, yet i have never left a league session and never become afk. I am upset that I have to wait 20 minutes every time I want to play a game. I have played well over 5 games now, and  I am still in low priority queue. Who else has this problem.

replies.body: Hmmmm I went ahead and took a detailed look over your account history to see why this might have happened. It does actually look like others might have had access you to your account, with your knowledge or not, and they might have been the ones who played when these LPQ's were placed. I'd submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to our account recovery teams asap to make sure your account is kept safe from anyone who may have access!
